artist: Artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; blue label with black text on cover; text in several different styles; images including festivals with samurai, court scenes with deer, ladies with baskets viewing monkeys inside lanterns, sweeping landscape views with labels on different areas
inscription: on first page, in black: inscription
markings: on second page, in red: two seals; on second page, in black: two seals
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Yamato (Yamato meisho zue 大和名所圖會)
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Yamato, vol. 1
